markdownRemark.html:
The most user friendly calendar on the market that enables everyone, young and old, to capture the important interactions in their life.

Moi for iPads launched in the fall of 2016 and still has a passionate user base. For years the community has wanted an iPhone and Android version as well as cloud backups. To acheive this the whole app has been rebuilt from scratch.

Moi was created by Freddy Breitenstein back in 2015 with the help of family and friends (you know who you are ðŸ’™).
